com.google.gwt.gears.client.desktop
Class BlobMetaData

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.google.gwt.gears.client.desktop.BlobMetaData

public class BlobMetaData
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Represents metadata about a Blob that has been extracted by Desktop.extractMetaData(com.google.gwt.gears.client.blob.Blob).

Constructor Summary
protected BlobMetaData()

 int getImageHeight()
          For blobs that contain image data in a well-known encoding (such as PNG or JPEG), returns the height of that image.

          For blobs that contain image data in a well-known encoding (such as PNG or JPEG), returns the width of that image.

Constructor Detail

BlobMetaData

protected BlobMetaData()
Method Detail

getImageHeight

public final int getImageHeight()
For blobs that contain image data in a well-known encoding (such as PNG or JPEG), returns the height of that image.

If the blob does not contain image data, a type-conversion error will occur in hosted mode and unpredictable behavior may occur in web mode.

Returns:
the image height.

getImageWidth

public final int getImageWidth()
For blobs that contain image data in a well-known encoding (such as PNG or JPEG), returns the width of that image.

If the blob does not contain image data, a type-conversion error will occur in hosted mode and unpredictable behavior may occur in web mode.

Returns:
the image width.

getMimeType

public final java.lang.String getMimeType()
Returns the MIME type of the blob, as calculated by Desktop.extractMetaData(com.google.gwt.gears.client.blob.Blob).

Returns:
the MIME type, such as "image/jpeg", "image/png", or "application/octet-stream".
